snippet: Officials said the operation was run by two stepbrothers, who enlisted their girlfriends and shared the proceeds with their mother, and extended to other New York City boroughs.
abstract: Officials say New York police busted up big Staten Island heroin ring run by two stepbrothers; 12 people are arrested and two others are sought.
lead_paragraph: Officials said the operation was run by two stepbrothers, who enlisted their girlfriends and shared the proceeds with their mother, and extended to other New York City boroughs.

headline.main: 12 Held as Police Break Up Staten Island Heroin Ring
headline.print_headline: 12 Held as Police Break Up Staten Island Heroin Ring
